body_html: awesome, thanks @ramonh! And I think it's definitely something we can reuse — I took a quick look to see if we had anything like that but it doesn't look like it, and it might be useful for the conferences table too. ;)
body_text: awesome, thanks @ramonh! And I think it's definitely something we can reuse — I took a quick look to see if we had anything like that but it doesn't look like it, and it might be useful for the conferences table too. ;)
body: awesome, thanks @ramonh! And I think it's definitely something we can reuse — I took a quick look to see if we had anything like that but it doesn't look like it, and it might be useful for the [conferences table](https://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/rgsoc-teams/blob/master/app/views/conferences/_table.html.erb#L21) too. ;)
